item.title: Supreme Court Approves JSW Steel’s Plans To Acquire Bhushan Power & Steel

item.title: Exide Industries Shares Pare Early Gains But SEBI RA Sees 18% Potential Upside
item.description: Exide announced an additional investment of ₹80 crore in its wholly owned subsidiary, Exide Energy Solutions (EESL), through a rights issue

item.title: Starbucks Stock Heads For Weekly Slide: Analyst Retains 'Buy' Call After Job Cuts, Store Closure Plans
item.description: While noting the development as a positive, the analyst believes that Starbucks' revival is taking longer than previously expected.
